channel.title: CVE Feed for SITEL -- CAP/PRX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SITEL -- CAP/PRX

item.title: CVE-2021-32453|2024-09-16T17:03:17.777Z -- sitel -- cap%2Fprx
item.description: SITEL CAP/PRX firmware version 5.2.01 allows an attacker with access to the local network, to access via HTTP to the internal configuration database of the device without any authentication. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability in order to obtain information about the device´s configuration.

item.title: CVE-2021-32455|2024-09-16T19:14:45.136Z -- sitel -- cap%2Fprx
item.description: SITEL CAP/PRX firmware version 5.2.01, allows an attacker with access to the device´s network to cause a denial of service condition on the device. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending HTTP requests massively.

item.title: CVE-2021-32454|2024-09-16T20:26:17.258Z -- sitel -- cap%2Fprx
item.description: SITEL CAP/PRX firmware version 5.2.01 makes use of a hardcoded password. An attacker with access to the device could modify these credentials, leaving the administrators of the device without access.
